text: Universidad Arturo Prat is a university in Chile. It is a derivative university part of the Chilean Traditional Universities. The university was created in 1981 from the former campus of the University of Chile in Iquique. It also has campuses in Arica, Calama, Santiago and Victoria ==External links== * Official Web Site * Universidad Arturo Prat Indicators, Research and Statistics Category:Universities in Chile Category:Universities in Los Ríos Region Category:Educational institutions established in 1984 Category:1984 establishments in Chile
title: Arturo Prat University
